changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.network_inferrence ( id bigserial NOT NULL, premise1 bigint NOT NULL, premise2 bigint NOT NULL, inferrence bigint NOT NULL, notes character varying, research bigint, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, CONSTRAINT network_inferrence_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT network_inferrence_relationship1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (premise1) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT network_inferrence_relationship2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (premise2) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT network_inferrence_relationship3_fkey FOREIGN KEY (inferrence) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT network_inferrence_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT network_inferrence_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT network_inferrence_relationship1_key UNIQUE (premise1 , premise2 ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
